LanguageData.RK_Ballista_Strait_Body.label: ballista
LanguageData.RK_Ballista_Strait_Body.description: It is a machine that fires large arrows. It is designed to be easy to operate by Ratkin.
LanguageData.RK_Turret_Ballista_Strait.label: ballista
LanguageData.RK_Turret_Ballista_Strait.description: ballista bolt launcher. accurate and long-ranged.
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Normal.label: ballista bolt (normal)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Normal.description: It is a ballista bolt. It will be hard to survive if hit by this big arrow.
LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaBolt_Normal.label: ballista bolt (normal)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Heavy.label: ballista bolt (HE)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_Heavy.description: It is a heavy ballista bolt. Increased the weight to increase impact.
LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaBolt_HE.label: ballista bolt (HE)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_AP.label: ballista bolt (AP)
LanguageData.BallistaBolt_AP.description: The ballistic bolt has high penetration. It can penetrate multiple target in firing lines.
LanguageData.Bullet_BallistaBolt_AP.label: ballista bolt (AP)
